headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein Production Facility
summary: Solar Foods launches its first factory for Solein, a protein made from air, electricity, and microbes.

headline: BioMason Receives Investment to Scale Sustainable Cement Alternative
summary: BioMason secures funding to increase production of its biologically-based cement alternative.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M to Scale Microbial Textile Production
summary: Modern Synthesis secured funding to expand production of its microbial textile, a sustainable leather alternative.

headline: Formo Announces Launch of First Precision-Fermented Cheese Product
summary: Formo introduces its inaugural cheese made using precision fermentation, marking a milestone for animal-free dairy.

headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy Production
summary: Change Foods gains investment to scale up its precision-fermentation process for creating vegan dairy products.

headline: MycoWorks Announces New Reishi Production Plant Expansion
summary: MycoWorks expands its Reishi production capacity to meet growing demand for its mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Air Protein Announces Partnership with Major Food Distributor
summary: Air Protein partners with a large distributor to bring its air-based protein to a wider audience.
